Question
========
  
In a study about a needle maze, some subjects are shocked and others are not. Moreover, some are told they will earn 10 euros if they complete the maze correctly in 5 times. The others are told they will get 100 euros in return. It turns out that the shocks have no effect on the subjects' behavior. But it turns out that those who are promised 100 euros learn faster than those who are promised only 10 euros. This result is an example of 
Answerlist
----------
* A main effect of motive (money).
* A main effect of shock.
* An interaction between shock and motive.
* A, b and c are all correct
